com.ardock.moodapp.moodgen.lib.ui.utils

Class BaseTabHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ardock.moodapp.moodgen.lib.ui.utils.BaseTabHelper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SliderTabHelper

    public abstract class BaseTabHelper
extends Object
    BaseTabHelper is a base helper class for your project that: Get the previous tabview position of the actual position. save/load/reset the base settings preferences. Get/Set a setting preference.
